episodes.title: Ex AA Alcoholics Anonymous members speak out live on ZOOM call meeting.They all agree, it's a cult !
episodes.description: Ex AA members speak out  regarding the dangers of AA from  older members telling new members they cant take their medications to being used for sex by old timers at conventions in Orlando Florida.

episodes.title: Ex Alcoholics Anonymous Board member talks - after he reads her Letter sent to The  WORLD AA BOARD.
episodes.description: This one hour interview  from 2011  when Monica first began to  make the film The 13th Step, is with an EX AA Board Member, Jim B.   who exposes what the AA Board did  after  Monica's 7 page letter  was sent to NY AA world headquarters.

episodes.title: 13th Step -a film by Monica Richardson
episodes.description: Award winning documentary about predatory people in Alcoholics Anonymous. When a violent offender gets court ordered to AA meetings instead of jail a murder occurs and investigation ensues for 4 Years.  Karla Brada was murdered  by Eric Earle, whom she met in an AA meeting. He was convicted to 25 years in prison.

episodes.title: Airline Pilot  sues United Airlines and wins $305,000 in damages  for being  forced to attend AA.
episodes.description: UA  will pay $305,000 to a Buddhist pilot and will provide other  relief to settle a religious  discrimination lawsuit filed by the U.S. Equal Employemnt Opportunity Commission (EEOC) , the federal agency announced today.  More to come ...

episodes.title: Is AA, alcoholics anonymous the mother of all cults in America ? w/ Mark Sheeren and Michelle Dunbar
episodes.description:
Is Alcoholics Anonymous the mother of all American cults? We  think so.  In 1935 it began slowly but quickly Bill Wilson it's founder  was meeting with Rockefeller, Henry Ford and many other  high society and wealthy  people who loved his idea and agenda. Powerlessness was their  slogan.  Find new members so we can grow. Is this why so many Americans have been quickly brainwashed into other cults like Scientology, EST, NXIUM, Children of GOD, JW, and  so many more. 

Join us as we do a deeper dive with  Mark Sheeren and Michelle Dunbar from The Freedom Model. The Addiction Solution Podcast https://www.thefreedommodel.org/the-addiction-solution-podcast/ created by Michelle and Mark. 

Go to Safe Recovery on Blog Talk Radio  https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/safe-recovery/id516854248 for more of Monica Richardson's podcasts. 

The Freedom Model book is available where all books are sold . https://www.amazon.com/Freedom-Model-Addictions-Treatment-Recovery/dp/0983471347

episodes.title: AA/NA Does not support MAT Medically Assisted Treatment in 2022 - why not ?
episodes.description: 38 year old Wesley contacted me to discuss his leaving AA and how Suboxone helped him to get over heroin addiction. Wesley believes that moving on in his life and getting active with things one cares about,  is better then sitting in a room talking about the same thing over and over again.

episodes.title: Book US of AA  author Joe Miller  talks history of Alcoholics Anonymous with Monica Richardson
episodes.description:
Joe Miller author of Historical look at AA, 12 steps and how they got and stayed so big and in power, even in the face of  new science and medicines.

https://www.amazon.com/US-AA-Hijacked-Science-Alcoholism/dp/1613739273/ref=sr_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=joe+miller+US+of+AA&qid=1635926629&sr=8-1
www.blogtalkradio.com/saferecovery.

episodes.title: Leaving AA /alcoholics anonymous -freedom from Cult thinking and controlling sponsors.
episodes.description: Short video about Leaving AA, deprogramming from AA ideology  by filmmaker, activist  Monica Richardson. Books to read The Greatest Secret in the World by Og Mandino, You've Been Lied to by Hank Hayes, The Sober Truth by Lance Dodes, Take Control Now by Dr Marc Kern P.h.D.

episodes.title: Airline Pilots sent to AA ( alcoholics anonymous ) HIMS program for LIFE FLYING Delta Airlines.
episodes.description: Mike  Danford /pilot and Monica Richardson discuss how Mike's career was ruined by Delta, HIMS Program, sent to AA based Rehab for one DUI. Never had AUD, or flew drunk,  but the system is still destroying careers of professional pilots this way since 1970's. READ The HIMS Nightmare, if you were forced to rehab and you are a pilot contact me on Facebook, here, or makeaasafer@gmail.com, The HIMS Nightmare on AMAZON  is a great book for pilots to read to save your career.

episodes.title: AA is controlling the narrative of addiction for too long & we are not being quiet anymore.
episodes.description: Guest Bobby C Cirillo  talks with Monica Richardson activist to expose the harm of AA and create change  with the #demandchoice movement. 1935 semi religious  cult  can no longer dictact an answer for probelmatic Alcohol use. Find Bobby @ anonymous addictions.

episodes.title: Alcoholics Anonymous Big Book is filled with lies, chapter 5 dissected.
episodes.description: Episode #1 tearing up Chapter 5 of the Big Book of AA  with Monica & Evelyn.

episodes.title: Is AA a cult ? Definitely yes ! Here’s why .
episodes.description:
Are you told only we can help you . You can never stop coming to meetings , or you will drink , die , go to jail etc . 

AA is filled with “ loaded language “ 

What step are you on . Slip - call your sponsor ! , make a gratitude list , be of service …

episodes.title: Planning your exit from AA -you will not die, go insane or go to prison. Freedom from fear.
episodes.description:
AA was created in 1935 and has never been updated. Many people are leaving AA now and are wondering will they be ok ? Of course we are ok , in fact we are so much better  and many of us feel so free now. This is the beginning of my story.
Books to read : 

Babylon Confidential by Claudia Christian, The Cure for alcoholism by ESKAPA, The Heart Of Addiction by Lance Dodes, The Freedom Model, 7 Weeks to Safe Social Drinking by Donna J Cornett, Take Control Now by Marc Kern, PhD, OUTGROWING ADDICTION by Peele & Rhoads, You've Been Lied to  by Hank Hayes. Her Best Kept Secret by Gabrielle Glaser, Recover Stop thinking like an addict, Ilse Thompson and Peele.

episodes.title: Alternatives to 12 step  meetings. Many young adults  are dying from  drugs/alcohol.
episodes.description:
Sadly many people are dying while closures continue . Loss of jobs, disconnected young people feel hopeless , and most Americans think AA is the only option. It’s not . 

Location : Marina Del Rey , 
Sapori great Italian restaurant by the water . 
Crepes and delicious strong espresso drinks next door 
Boat rentals near by 

Alternatives to AA 
SMART Recover 
Harm Reduction 
The Sinclair method 
The freedom model 
Moderation management

episodes.title: Deprogramming from Alcoholics Anonymous , AA - Small
episodes.description: Help for when you are LEAVING AA. Filmmaker of The 13th Step, Monica Richardson talks on the process of leaving AA - Alternative books to read and ideology to leave behind.
